pkgmetadata.longdescription: PVAccess for Python===================Python bindings for the PVAccess network client and server. python -m virtualenv p4ptest . p4ptest/bin/activate python -m pip install -U pip python -m pip install p4p python -m nose2 p4pSee documentationhttps://mdavidsaver.github.io/p4p/Sourcehttps://github.com/mdavidsaver/p4p/CI results![Github Actions](https://github.com/mdavidsaver/p4p/workflows/P4P/badge.svg)
